name: JetpacToo
description:
A mysterious planetoid has appeared in the solar system, in a race to try and exploit its resources different nations send their robot-manned ships to investigate, however as the ships approach a powerful energy wave causes them to crash land almost destroying them.

It is now a race between the different factions marooned on the surface to reassemble their ships and head back to claim official ownership to the planetoid.

JetpacToo is a single or multi player game supporting cross play between flat-screen and VR. This has been created primarily to test the network and real-time planet terraforming technology for the upcoming god-game Me Igigu and what better way then to recreate an old-school classic in 3D.

The game has 2 main modes, All VS All where up to 6 people can compete to find (or steal) the resources to build their ships and protect their launch pad and Team Match, with 2 teams of up to 3 people each.
